resources.string: "'Sometimes you have to accept you can't win all the time.' - "
"'You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.'"
"'You can overcome anything, if and if only you love something enough.'"
"'I start early and I stay late, day after day, year after year, it took me 17 years and 114 days to become an overnight success.'"
"'Iâ€™m happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love.'"
